title: Phree Private Schooling, Weed For Vaccinations, Sister O'dell, R. Kelly Trials and more,
itunes:title: Phree Private Schooling, Weed For Vaccinations, Sister O'dell, R. Kelly Trials and more,
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Woman Crush Wednesday is here and Sister O'dell has something to say just in time for Father's Day. R. Kelly's legal team is minus two attorneys and Steve's breakdown paints the picture clearly. Washington State has one of the best incentives for getting vaccinated. The CLO tells the truth to "the other chick" and it stings. Big ups to Simone Biles! She is the G.O.A.T. and there is nothing else to say. Skateboard P has a new project that will directly benefit those that come from low income families. Just in time for Wellness Wednesday, there is a new nature pyramid to look out for that may have health benefits attached to it. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve says this, "there is no time like the present" and he asks a question. Are you willing to stick to it and hang in there to see it through?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
